nodes.text: BX-2R, or Toor, was a renovated BX-series droid commando assigned to janitorial work at Moff Lasre Dardano's Whisper Base. Toor was fitted with a restraining bolt and was responsible for cleaning the garage and filing reports. In 0 ABY, the droid encountered a team of Rebel Alliance operatives trying to capture the base.
Toor appears in Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game adventure Takeover at Whisper Base. The players may free Toor, who will act as an ally, or otherwise incapacitate him.
